body.name: Smart Watch for Android iOS, Bluetooth Call, 100+ Sports Modes, 1.46" AMOLED Rugged Military Fitness Watch, Heart Rate/Sleep/Fitness Tracker, IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch for Men Women(Camo+Black Bands)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 13 mins
features: ⌚【RUGGED MILITARY SMART WATCH】Sturdy zinc alloy metal shell with 1.46" Ultra HD AMOLED screen. Military-grade materials and fully enclosed design made the smart watch a shockproof dustproof construction, combining texture and durability. AMOLED display adopts spotlight technology, greatly improved brightness and resolution, ensuring clear and excellent visual experience. More energy-efficient than other LCD displays. 200+ smart watch wallpapers to choose from, satisfy diverse aesthetics.

💬【KEEP CONNECTED BY SMART WATCH】One-click stable bluetooth connection, ensures you are always in touch. ①Make Calls: Answer and make calls directly with built-in microphone and speaker. Support checking call history, synchronizing and adding contacts. ②Smart Notifications: Receive mobile SMS or APP notifications with vibration to remind.③AI Voice Assistant: Ask questions, and give instructions by using your voice. Free your hands, enjoy convenient communication anytime, anywhere.

💗【TRACK YOUR HEALTH & SLEEP STATUS】Bulit-in high-precision sensor and photodiodes continuously capture your health data for 24h: heart rate, blood oxygen, blood pressure, etc. Clearly present data changes in the form of curves or graphs, showing you a comprehensive view of your health. Record your sleep time and sleep status in real-time, form a sleep report so you can know how to improve your sleep. (only for reference can't be used for medical purposes)

🚴【100+ SPORT MODES FITNESS TRACKER】An ultimate easy-to-use smart watch with 100+ sports modes. From running and basketball to climbing and pilates, whether you're daily exercise or outdoor enthusiasts, get data for all your favorite sports. You can set a variety of goals for different workout types on app, such as Pace, Distance, and Calorie goal which help better understand exercise status and track progress. IP68 water-resistance can withstand all your daily activities usage.

🔋【40+DAYS ULTRA LONG BATTERY LIFE】High-density lithium battery is enough for 40+days standby and 10+days of normal use after fully charged (varies with use and other factors.) With the upgraded magnetic fast charging cable, the smart watch can be fully charged in 2h. Adopted intelligent algorithm to achieve lower power consumption, provide you with the ultimate worry-free battery life experience. This military smart watch definitely a great partner for your outdoor activities and adventures.

🎁【EXTRA GIFT BAND & MORE FUNCTIONS】Every fitness smart watch comes with 2 watch bands: Camouflage/Balck bands to better custimize your needs. More functions to explore: Weather, No disturb mode, Music, Flashlight, Game, Calculator, Sedentary reminder, Find phone, Power saving mode, Temperture, Timer, Alarms, Stop watch, Camera etc. It's a perfect gift choice for friends and family members to help them stay full of energy all day!

💌【NO HASSLE AFTER-SALE SERVICE】We have carefully inspected each military smart watch before delivery to ensure that every customer receives a normal and intacted smartwatch. if you have any questions on this smart watch for android iphone, please email prepill79@gmail.com and we will get back within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's just what you need for tracking your fitness activities, along with all the communication and entertainment features that will bring more luxury to this incredibly amazing watchIt's a all in one package!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to work
reviews.reviewText: So far it came perfect and is so easy to work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome design with more than 48hr battery life
reviews.reviewText: I am been using this watch from Saturday and this watch doesn’t disappoint me. Like the color of band which come with extra black band if you wanna replace for a change. Pick up my call, read a text and also track my sleep schedule from this watch. Like the design which gives you the vibes of analog watch. I think it most reliable and efficient smartwatch with decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So solid duty watch...
reviews.reviewText: This smart watch wrist is comfortable 👌 all day I'm use at my work(construction) battery 🔋 life longer than my old watch. Watch face is 6 or 7 different face its nothing boring its very interesting. So easy to connect my android phone. During work easy to answer my phone via my watch. Recommended who's gonna buy this watch highly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this watch
reviews.reviewText: I bought this wondering how good it was actually going to be because the price was so good. My favorite feature is the Bluetooth. I haven’t had any issues and the volume has been really good as well!! Pretty impressed with this watch!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, value for money is worth it. 100% recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking smart watch. Screen is absolutely stunning with Ultra HD AMOLED display. Easy to connect to the phone using bluetooth. Battery is holding for days. One touch operation for most of the features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality gift
reviews.reviewText: Great gift for my son who isn’t always very careful with technology. The screen has great definition and the face options are detailed and multi-functional. He’s going to love the Siri integration and I’ll love that it’s rugged enough to hold up to his outdoor activities.
